divs: sighting detailsi had just put my children to bed and around 11:30 i went outside on my deck to smoke a cig. i was standing there and about half way through my cig i noticed a green light reflecting in the water i looked up and saw 3 lights about the size of softballs about 20 feet above the water. at first they were close together i would say about 6 feet apart in a tryangler shape. i stood there just looking at them for a second or so, then they spread apart and i'm not sure what happend after that because i was surrounded with a greenlight that was so bright i couldn't even see, i had to squint my eyes. then it just vanished. i stood there my cigarett and my small black lighter that was in my hand was gone no where to be found and i just walked inside. i didn't know what time it was becuase all my clocks were blinking. my computer wouldn't turn on and all the lights i had left on were out. they came back on after a few min. i sat down on the couch no knowing what just happend i wasn't sure if i shoud call someone or what so i tried calling my friend who is the founder of the paranormal society i'm in but he didn't answer the phone. so i just ate some food and sat there all night, i didn't even go to sleep until morning and my children didn't go to school that day because i am a paranormal investigater, i have been for about 10 years. i have never seen anything like this.it wasn't a plane. it wasn't some sort of light from a house and it was defently not a ghost. what ever it was it scared the living [cms\tg\pd] out of me... (excuse my launguage) i want to move becasue i'm not sure what it was or if it's going to happen again. tonight since i am all about proof i am going to go outside and sit on my deck and see if it happends again, i have a camera and a voice recorder. but this time i'm not going to have my children home and i'm not doing it alone. this has never happend to me before so i'm pretty freaked about it.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Gloucester
There were no other sightings in Gloucester on or around May 28th 2009
Summary: 3 green lights that were bright and the shape of a triangle.
